alert.note: Alert for Ward (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 19 at 11:54AM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Souris River near Foxholm affecting Ward County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Souris River near Foxholm. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1571.0 feet, East bank begins to overflow. At 1575.0 feet, Rural flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 1572.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 1573.6 feet early tomorrow afternoon. Minor flooding is expected to continue into the weekend. - Flood stage is 1573.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 1573.5 feet on 04/05/2017. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
